snippet: The state issued its first legal-marijuana business license Wednesday, beginning a new phase in its effort to regulate a market that has been illegal for more than 75 years.
abstract: Washington State issues its first legal-marijuana business license, beginning a new phase in its effort to regulate a market that has been illegal for more than 75 years.
lead_paragraph: The state issued its first legal-marijuana business license Wednesday, beginning a new phase in its effort to regulate a market that has been illegal for more than 75 years.

headline.main: Washington: A First for Legal Marijuana
headline.print_headline: Washington: A First for Legal Marijuana
